name: Meteorite Odyssey
description:
What

The objective is to deflect as many meteorites as possible and to survive as long as you can. This is achieved by jumping (using space or the up arrow). However, as meteorites hit the planet, it gradually gets smaller. You can move to the side using the left/right arrows.

Move using the left and right arrows. Jump using the up arrow or space. Make sure to focus on the page for these to work.

Why

Themed after 2001: Space Odyssey, we created this for the 2018 game jam at the LCC (London College of Communication). This took place on the 7th and 8th of February.

Who

This edition was made by:
 + Yu-Chien Huang (art & game design)
 + Mike (HTML5/javascript)
 + Jessica Kate Worley (art & game design)
 + Marui Hunte (art)

Stasys Skucas, Yu-Chien, Jessica and Maruj also created a two player version of this game in Unity, where the second player spawns the meteorites with the mouse.
